entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] `wasmconsole` build raises `warning CA1416: This call site is reachable on all platforms. 'JSExportAttribute' is only supported on: 'browser'.` #79314
  • [release/7.0][wasm] `RollForward` needed for `WasmAppHost` on `release/7.0` branch #79313
    7.0.x
  • Provide trim/AOT-safe mechanism to (de)serialize enums from strings with JSON source-gen #79311
    8.0.0
  • Assert ((size_t)g_gc_lowest_address - ps) >= OS_PAGE_SIZE #79308
    8.0.0
  • [workloads] downlevel workload version improvements #79304
    8.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException when using compiled and ignorecase regex in .NET 7.0 #79298
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Csp.Tests.WorkItemExecution fails on macos with SIGSEGV #79297
  • Mono WASM disk size regressions #79288
  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79286
    8.0.0
  • Mono iOS and WASM disk size regressions #79285
  • DateTime.Now from .NET 6 will return UTC time, not local time in Arm64 Docker Image #79282
  • iOS & tvOS legs are failing to AOT System.Net.Http.Json #79279
  • [wasm] Use `current` version of node for tests on CI #79270
    8.0.0
  • Dotnet core consuming lot of memory? #79287
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #79306
  • Regressions in PerfLabTests.CastingPerf #79305
  • Regressions in System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests.SafeHandleTests #79301
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_VectorOf SquareRootBenchmark #79294
  • Running .NET 7 single file binary on Apple M1 chip causes app to be "killed" #79267
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteJson<Int32> #79292
  • Regressions in Exceptions.Handling #79291
  • Is there a way to tell SSLStreams to validate the remote certificate based on the certificate present in path rather than Windows keystore? #79266
    Future
  • AsnEncodedData.Format return empty for CRL extension in Linux #79265
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\0046\\istype\\istype.cmd #79263
  • [API Proposal]: Provide an Stream abstraction centered on best-practices #79261
  • JIT: Improve rangecheck for certain binops #79257
    Future
  • Linux Release AllSubsets_Mono_LLVMFullAot_RuntimeTests llvmfullaot fails on CI #79255

Closed

  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.NumberHandlingTests.Number_AsCollectionElement_RoundTrip failing in jitstress #79290
    8.0.0
  • Pass callback from host to runtime for getting properties from the host #77458
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder is not linker-safe #40551
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Collections.ContainsFalse<String> #79295
  • On Windows File.CreateSymbolicLink method does not create a working symlink in case the pathToTarget parameter is a relative path with forward slashes #79031
  • [API Proposal]: Generic ArgumentNullException/ArgumentException that returns original value when not null #79179
  • Packages need to stabilize for shipping .NET 7 #72111
    7.0.0
  • Different ShortDatePattern for the same CultureInfo on different Platforms #79275
  • Regression in System.Tests.Perf_UInt64 (ToString) #79289
  • Regression in System.Tests.Perf_Int64.TryParseSpan #79293
  • Runtime_76194 fails on ARM32 #78758
  • [Android] Investigate support for SSLStream below API Level 24 #78715
    8.0.0
  • [ppc64le][.net7] Unhandled Exception: System.PlatformNotSupportedException: System.Data.ODBC is not supported on this platform #78563
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Convert argument null checks to ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #68326
    8.0.0
  • Illegal runtime behavior in C++ code taking reference to null pointer #73392
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM locale currency differs from Browser WASM #79235
    8.0.0
  • Tests for float- and double- backed Enums #29266
    Future
  • Idea for reducing enum parsing/formatting overheads #76398
    Future
  • Special-case enums in interpolated string handlers #76157
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add method TryFormat for Enum #57881
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #78515
  • Add InstructionEncoder.Switch to enable emitting switch instructions with LabelHandles #40546
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Serialization\\Serialize\\Serialize.cmd #79132
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Incompatible types for gtNewTempAssign"' #78944
    8.0.0
  • Native AOT always produced warning about including the NuGet package in .NET 8 #78647
    8.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection fails Bind() on Linux Systems for non-ASCII Passwords #76426
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0][wasm] Add RollForward=LatestMajor for WasmAppHost . #79315
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Fix infinite recursion in the AOT dwarf emitter. #79310
  • Fix test by actually passing the message and exception. #79307
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Replace ldobj.vt + stobj.vt.noref pair with cpobj.vt.noref #79302
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Call BIO_gets in a loop until no more data can be read #79300
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Automatically calculate the net6 patch version #79299
    7.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • WIP: Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79281
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][Android] Fix SslStream on legacy Android API levels #79280
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0][Android] Fix SslStream on legacy Android API levels #79277
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.14
  • Move the rearrange_uoh_segments call earlier so that distribute_free_regions can take them into account #79262
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Select libraries using the ICU build time version #79259
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 8.0.0

Merged

  • JIT: Avoid containing small memory operands in GT_SELECT nodes #79296
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prevent warning for implicit ILCompiler reference #79240
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add mechanism for runtime to query host for information #78798
    area-Host
  • Reserve memory for FOH in-range #78292
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite Enum and add {ISpanFormattable}.TryFormat #78580
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Documentation signature parser tests and fixes for NativeAOT #79168
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use tokens for validation of Kept members in linker tests for NativeAOT #79228
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid dereferencing null if the debugger APIs are called before initializing the AppDomain #78970
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Bump 6.0 workload #79085
    7.0.x
  • Add condition to backport.yml #79276
  • Fold all local addresses in local morph #79194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix comment typo in DateTime.cs #79278
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Fix Runtime_76194 test #78760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tizen x64 cross build support #79226
    community-contribution
  • [corlib] Don't include Interop.InitializeTerminalAndSignalHandling.cs on mobile #79269
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers from type loader (part 6 of X) #79264
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Map correct fmt for mov instruction #79174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #78918
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Move reference assembly logic into root msbuild files #79268
    area-Infrastructure
  • remove default framework in perf setup script #79258
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Supply `-s INITIAL_MEMORY` to emcc in wasm.proj #79148
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix Processor Count getting ignored due to typo in libs/build-native.proj #79249
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers from type loader (part 5 of X) #79260
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Delete workarounds for RuntimeInformation.OSArchitecture bugs #79256
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix creating incorrect options in the repro package #79095
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix run.cmd syntax error #79250
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable Runtime_31615 #79252
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete .NET Native leftovers from type loader (part 4 of X) #79138
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] Allow new temp assignment whose dstTyp is TYP_I_IMPL and valTyp is TYP_BYREF #79162
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allocate static boxes on FOH #2 #79188
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • A gentle reminder that TraceGC is turned off #79183
    area-GC-coreclr
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add ProductVersionSuffix to workload manifest names #79184
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • SP800-108 CTR HMAC #79120
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1 #79013
    area-System.Security
  • Remaining feedback part1 #79011
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - build projects for net8.0 by default #79254
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Enable all of the jiterpreter's JITs by default #78493
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - Allow containment of larger memory operands for `AND`, `OR`, `XOR` #79126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #78532
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.3
  • [Release/7.0] Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource (#78213) #79009
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Correctly escape library names when generating symbols for .c #79175
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.3
  • Improve CI path-changes-based-triggers to work better #79127
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add warning code to all warnings produced in WasmAppBuilder #79234
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.3
  • Produce crashreport.json and use llvm-symbolizer to create stack trace #77578
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete some `ADDR`-related code #78246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Split library and package Readme #78888
    area-Meta, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Move AT_EXECFN to fallback for /proc/self/exe #79057
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 7.0.3
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interpreter] Throw when basic blocks after branch are not created #79246
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Split #79048
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Workaround MacCatalyst .app output path change in cmake 3.25 #79098
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Workaround MacCatalyst .app output path change in cmake 3.25 #79097
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Be more precise about choosing what to DNER in block morphing #77980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disallow `IND<struct>` except as a source of `STORE_DYN_BLK` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Cloning files on OSX-like platforms when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Remove span pinning associated with string.Create #78914
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Outline exception throws in the interp and ifdef out unreachable opcodes #79239
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Convert Array icalls to use ObjectHandleOnStack. #77343
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • replace redhawk with nativeaot #79217
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated with cached credentials #79128
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Do not override content root with default #79242
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add readmes for @dotnet/area-system-io #78935
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Add readmes for @dotnet/area-extensions-filesystem #78954
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Fixing assert on variable live range for simd12 LCL / STORE_LCL #79182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Take EventListener.EventListenersLock in EventPipeEventDispatcher.SendCommand #79185
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add some simple perf tests comparing deep await chains to deep green thread waits #2108

Merged

  • [Green-Threads] Add a set of benchmarks with deeper stacks #2107
    area-green-threads

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to 17/12/21 #2101

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PlatformTarget default value error #29404

Closed

  • PublishAot warning with net8.0 #28823
    8.0.1xx
  • Test Microsoft.NET.Publish.Tests.GivenThatWeWantToPublishAClickOnceProject.PublishClickOnceWithPublishProfile failed in CI #27766
    8.0.1xx
  • After Multi-Target 'Net6.0-Windows;Net48' Why am I getting this error NETSDK1073: The FrameworkReference 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App' was not recognized #28859
  • Unable to obtain lock file access on '/tmp/NuGetScratch/lock/...' since .NET 7 #29394
  • 1stBug #29081
  • After upgrading to VS 2022 Preview 15.0.1- Unable to open the existing projects targeting the version 6.0 #29375

PullRequests

Created

  • Update minimum msbuild to 17.4 #29416
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix for ClickOnce publish test failure #29399

Updated

  • Import the Container Build package from WebSDK #28845
    Area-WebSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add option for specifying the version of machine-readable output of dotnet list package command #29367
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary sources from the test used nuget.config file to reduce 429s #29371
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink
  • Add support for default values of methods parameters in the GenAPI. #29356
    Area-GenAPI
  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Pull razor dependencies from consolidate repo #29374
    Area-CodeFlow, 7.0.2xx
  • dotnet nuget commands show correct help text #29266
    Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "deconstruction in from and let" #189
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Adjust invocation rules for ref return of ref struct type #6781

Updated

  • Create notes from working group meeting #6767

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a setting to only use IDE0180 Use tuple swap if it will avoid extra temps #65815
  • In vs2022, the c# code format around #if/#endif fails to handle mixed line endings #65806
  • VSCode tasks are broken #65803
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException while renaming #65798
  • SolutionState should enforce changes to a document happen to all links of that document atomically. #65797

Closed

  • Inconsistency between `!= null` and `is not null` on NRTs #65740
  • .net 7.0 PublishAot will destroy the Source generators code #65801

PullRequests

Created

  • Add 17.6-vs-deps branch to config #65821
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure we recompute top level semantic versions, even when making frozen documents #65820
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Use lower logging level for verbose messages #65819
    Area-IDE
  • Fix inline rename in MAUI #65818
    Area-IDE
  • Skip tests on 32bit debug due to messagepack issue #65817
    Area-IDE
  • Atomically update all linked files in a solution snapshot when one of them is updated. #65816
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify GlobalKeywordRecommender #65814
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Refactor snippets #65811
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Stop referencing packages that became inbox on modern .NET. #65810
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Ensure lvalue struct receivers are not copied by value implicit Range indexer rewrite #65805
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `dotnet` instead of `.dotnet/dotnet` in VSCode tasks #65804
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Delete Compilers.sln and keep only Compilers.slnf #65802
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Remove options that have the same editorconfig name #65800
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65795
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Make main-vs-deps PRs non-draft #65791
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Link compiler analysis scope to solution-specific override #65813
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Extract a few more interfaces from the VS layer project system #65799
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused method #65785
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Find refs - Remove bogus assert and add test #65675
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Cleanup redundant NeitherNull methods #65807
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Remove unused methods #65782
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move to using ToListAndFree in more places in the parser. #65708
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Implement parsing changes for Primary Constructors feature #65720
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #65642
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65822
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to more consistent patterns in the parser. #65724
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65786
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • reduce the amount of time that we switch from a background thread to … #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecessary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • WIP: Share syntax trees across linked files. #65793
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Always cache our lazy values. #65719
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify WeaklyCachedRecoverableValueSource #65717
    Area-IDE
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit `DecimalConstantAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Update few completion tests #65490
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cleanup unused generated code #65723
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new API to easily tell if a node contains conditional preprocessor directives (without allocations). #65794
    Area-Compilers
  • Add more test scenarios for symbol completion after scoped #65747
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adding support for positional patterns to GenerateDeconstructMethodFixProvider.cs #65748
    Area-IDE, Community
  • log data for analyzers/codefixes/refactorings #65158
    Area-IDE
  • Force arrow cursor for inline rename flayout #65783
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow multiline override #65395
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HTTP3 QUIC - client over Cronet sends CertificateUnknown and closes QUIC listener #45482
  • Perf improvement: json #45481
  • QuickGrid: Support sorting with a custom comparer. #45478
  • QuickGrid: Add API to specify a custom class for <tr>. #45477
    Backlog
  • ReadOnly exception from dotnet core middleware - Kubernetes container pods with a read-only filesystem #45476
  • [AOT] Fix hosting/HTTP/server/middleware/routing/auth AOT warnings #45473

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, mvc #45464
  • Sending a request with empty body to an endpoint with a filter, returns the `Task` result on the response bdy when running with the Production environment #45432
  • Perf regression: mapaction #45465
  • Authentication Builder Update #45452
    Discussions
  • Dotnet 7 Javascript API : pass ElementReference as parameter #45416
  • EndpointMiddleware should not catch exceptions #45180
    8.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove allocation of logger name from constructor of Renderer #45480
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Skip test that creates symlink on Windows #45479
    8.0-preview1
  • Remove framework boxing in Minimal when writing Json #45472
    Perf, area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Enable nullable reference types in analyzer projects #45454
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Regenerating src/SignalR/clients/ts/common/yarn.lock #45470
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview1
  • Update CODEOWNERS #45391
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix endpoint Middlweware #45460
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Warn the user if they're specifying protocols that won't be used #45352
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Cleanup Mvc Analyzers #42754
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Resolve all descriptors from registry #45436
    area-grpc
  • Support `sub` as `ExternalLoginInfo.ProviderKey` #45198
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Fix ControllerLinkGeneratorExtensions throw ArgumentException #43845 #45467
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Vectorized HttpCharacters (and used IndexOfAnyValues in other places found) #45300
    Perf, blocked, area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Remove obsolete classes #45466
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Hosting] Add {OriginalFormat} to start & stop log state objects #45253
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2061560 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure
  • Introduce non-virtual RegisterTokenProviderCore method. #45413
    area-identity

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • E2E guide how to collect a dump and debug it with VS or LLDB #2903
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Search for the diagnostics socket in the mount NS of the target process #3539
  • [Dotnet Monitor] Revert To Logging a single payload (not a list) #3538

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Layout Cycle Detected when a Flexlayout is inside a StackLayout on Windows #11909
  • Unable to archive app if it references a .NET Standard 2.0 class library #11906
  • Webview.EvaluateJavaScriptAsync does not execute with newline #11905
    Backlog
  • Android Release mode build doesn't work #11901
  • ListView does not work properly on Android #11900
    Backlog
  • Problem with CollectionView which is wrapped in ContentView #11897
    Backlog
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items #11896
    Backlog
  • iOS Rotate animation is very choppy due to LOTS of unneceesary measure cycles and makes application unusably slow #11891
    Backlog
  • Mac Catalyst Binding Library not callable #11890

Closed

  • Maui Android Crash CarouselView IndicatorView on navigating second time #11310
    Backlog
  • MAUI 7.0 iOS Release build won't install on iOS 16 #11385
  • Gtk sharp abandoned? #11889
  • I have problem with run iOS simulator (error DVTITunesSoftwareServiceFoundation) #11899
  • [Android] ScrollView accessibility is broken #11157
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • MAUI 7.0 iOS Release build won't install on iOS 16 #11838
  • MAUI program cannot be started in net7.0-android33.0 #11869

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove non platform TFM and sync up SupportedOSPlatformVersion #11910
  • Modify generics on replaced mappers inside `Controls` to cover more types. #11907

Merged

  • [Android] Fix crash disconnecting the IndicatorView #11346
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, version/android-13
  • Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #11591
    area/gestures
  • [net7.0] Update PublicAPI.Shipped.txt files #11759
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1418.22 to 1.0.1462.37 #11898
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11888
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [build] Fix changelog workflow #11895

Updated

  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Add missing await call for color match test #11016
    area/controls 🎮
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [WinUI] Fix the size returned when measuring Frame #11779
    area/layout 🔲
  • Use darc to get feeds for dependencies of build #11487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Update Essentials Email API Docs #11868
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix being unable to access some resources #11214
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Update Essentials FilePicker API Docs #11870
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 MigrateAsync() not working anymore #29786
  • AutoTransactionBehavior change breaks under AWS RDS Aurora MySql Proxy -- throws DbUpdateConcurrencyException #29785
  • EF Core 7 - FirstWithoutOrderByAndFilterWarning in simple query with multiple aggregate functions #29782

Closed

  • SQLite RevEng: Use .NET types #29614
  • Remove parentheses by allowing providers to specify SQL operator precedence and associativity #27253
  • Expression query not computed anymore from .NET Core 3.1 to .NET Core 6 #29736
  • ChangeTracker not behaving as expected for nested objects. #29765
  • SQL Server - Table-Per-Hierarchy (TPH) - Creates multiple FKs to the same table #29770

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix making column required on SQL Server with idempotent migrations #29784
  • Updating SQLitePCLRaw library versions to 2.1.3 as it has ppc64le sup… #29783
  • SQLite: Simplify !Regex.IsMatch to NOT REGEXP #29781

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix missing HasForeignKey when principal key is an alternate key #29731
  • [release/7.0] Fix SQL Server bulk insert edge case (#29669) #29717
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Fix bug where a non-sproc command comes before a sproc command #29722
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Support entities with owned types in ExecuteUpdate setter property lambda #29723
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Use correct parameter in query based on type mapping #29724
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Allow shared columns with nullable value converters #29778
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
